languages.text: "Лишь миряне мнят чувства прерогативой ущербной плоти. Нам ведомы высшие страсти, дарованные Омниссией — отвращение к техноскверне, благодать соответствия канону обслуживания, удовлетворенность эффективностью служения".

"Only laypersons believe feelings to be the preserve of flawed flesh. We know the higher passions granted by the Omnissiah — the aversion to techcorruption, the blessing of compliance with the canon of maintenance, and the satisfaction of effective devotional service."
languages.original_text: "Лишь миряне мнят чувства прерогативой ущербной плоти. Нам ведомы высшие страсти, дарованные Омниссией — отвращение к техноскверне, благодать соответствия канону обслуживания, удовлетворенность эффективностью служения".

languages.text: “只有无知的门外汉才会认为感情是肉体遗留的缺陷，而我们深知欧姆尼塞亚赋予我们更加崇高的激情——对技术腐败的厌恶，对遵循维护规范的祝福，以及投身于高效奉献所带来的满足。”
languages.original_text: "Only laypersons believe feelings to be the preserve of flawed flesh. We know the higher passions granted by the Omnissiah — the aversion to techcorruption, the blessing of compliance with the canon of maintenance, and the satisfaction of effective devotional service."

traits.locale_text: “只有无知的门外汉才会认为感情是肉体遗留的缺陷，而我们深知欧姆尼塞亚赋予我们更加崇高的激情——对技术腐败的厌恶，对遵循维护规范的祝福，以及投身于高效奉献所带来的满足。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Il n'y a bien que les profanes pour croire que les sentiments sont réservés à la chair imparfaite. Nous sommes familiers des passions qu'accorde l'Omnimessie : l'aversion de la technocorruption, la bénédiction de la conformité avec le canon de la maintenance, et la satisfaction du service dévot. »
languages.original_text: "Only laypersons believe feelings to be the preserve of flawed flesh. We know the higher passions granted by the Omnissiah — the aversion to techcorruption, the blessing of compliance with the canon of maintenance, and the satisfaction of effective devotional service."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a bien que les profanes pour croire que les sentiments sont réservés à la chair imparfaite. Nous sommes familiers des passions qu'accorde l'Omnimessie : l'aversion de la technocorruption, la bénédiction de la conformité avec le canon de la maintenance, et la satisfaction du service dévot. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Nur Laien glauben, dass Gefühle dem fehlerhaften Fleisch vorbehalten sind. Wir kennen die höheren Leidenschaften, die der Omnissiah gewährt — die Abneigung gegenüber der Techkorruption, den Segen der Einhaltung des Wartungskanons, die Befriedigung, die effektiver frommer Dienst einem gibt."
languages.original_text: "Only laypersons believe feelings to be the preserve of flawed flesh. We know the higher passions granted by the Omnissiah — the aversion to techcorruption, the blessing of compliance with the canon of maintenance, and the satisfaction of effective devotional service."

traits.locale_text: "Nur Laien glauben, dass Gefühle dem fehlerhaften Fleisch vorbehalten sind. Wir kennen die höhere Leidenschaften, die der Omnissiah gewhärt — die Abneigung gegenüber der Techkorruption, den Segen der Einhaltung des Wartungskanons, die Befriedigung, die effektiver frommer Dienst einem gibt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「感情とは欠陥のある肉体のものだと信じているのは俗人だけ。私たちは万機神によって与えられた、より高い情熱を知っている。技術的腐敗への嫌悪、維持の帝国法規を遵守することの祝福、効果的な献身的奉仕をすることの満足感」
languages.original_text: "Only laypersons believe feelings to be the preserve of flawed flesh. We know the higher passions granted by the Omnissiah — the aversion to techcorruption, the blessing of compliance with the canon of maintenance, and the satisfaction of effective devotional service."

traits.locale_text: 「感情とは欠陥のある肉体のものだと信じているのは俗人だけ。私たちは万機神によって与えられた、より高い情熱を知っている。技術的腐敗への嫌悪、維持の帝国法規を遵守することの祝福、効果的な献身的奉仕をすることの満足感」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Solo los laicos creen que las emociones son dominio exclusivo de la carne falible. Conocemos las pasiones superiores que concede el Omnissiah: la aversión a la corrupción tecnológica, la bendición del cumplimiento de los cánones de mantenimiento y la satisfacción de un servicio eficaz y devoto».
languages.original_text: "Only laypersons believe feelings to be the preserve of flawed flesh. We know the higher passions granted by the Omnissiah — the aversion to techcorruption, the blessing of compliance with the canon of maintenance, and the satisfaction of effective devotional service."

traits.locale_text: «Solo los laicos creen que las emociones son dominio exclusivo de la carne falible. Conocemos las pasiones superiores que concede el Omnissiah: la aversión a la corrupción tecnológica, la bendición del cumplimiento de los cánones de mantenimiento y la satisfacción de un servicio eficaz y devoto».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Only laypersons believe feelings to be the preserve of flawed flesh. We know the higher passions granted by the Omnissiah — the aversion to techcorruption, the blessing of compliance with the canon of maintenance, and the satisfaction of effective devotional service."

languages.text: "Yalnızca mesleğe yabancı olanlar duyguların kusurlu tene özgü olduğuna inanır. Bizler Hermesih'in bahşettiği daha yüce tutkulara tabiyiz: Teknoyozluktan nefret, bakım nizamnamesine riayet lütfu ve etkin adanmış hizmetin getirdiği tatmin."
languages.original_text: "Only laypersons believe feelings to be the preserve of flawed flesh. We know the higher passions granted by the Omnissiah — the aversion to techcorruption, the blessing of compliance with the canon of maintenance, and the satisfaction of effective devotional service."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca mesleğe yabancı olanlar duyguların kusurlu tene özgü olduğuna inanır. Bizler Hermesih'in bahşettiği daha yüce tutkulara tabiyiz: Teknoyozluktan nefret, bakım nizamına riayet lütfu ve etkin adanmış hizmetin getirdiği tatmin."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
